name: Earth Defence (Supernova*Software)
overview: A space shooter published by Supernova*Software and and released as part of the "4 in 1 Game Pack". Not to be confused by the re-release by Liang Marketing that had changed the program by improving the graphics and the sound. "Earth shuttle 1 to control- have picked up a large amount of unidentified ships approaching earth, requesting orders" "Control to earth shuttle 1 we have detected them. Your orders follow: contact has been made with the aliens, they are hostile and intend to destroy earth. You are the only armed shuttle we have in orbit and we can't get any more off the ground in time. You must intercept the aliens and stop them from reaching earth, you're earth's last defense...
